ModMetaData.name: Mini Crematorium
ModMetaData.author: Squirting Elephant
ModMetaData.description:
This is an updated version of Squirting Elephant's Mini-Crematorium mod, crafted with permission of the owner. It also makes the building a separate building to retain the original crematorium size.
This mod introduces a new building â€” a 1x1 compact version of the Electric Crematorium as a separate building (as requested).
Can be added mid-save. Make sure to fully destroy all versions of the Mini-Crematorium before attempting to remove the mod from an existing save.
Thanks to [b]SquirtingElephant[/b] for this very useful mod.
